about_the_game:
In the Traveler, you find yourself lost and alone in a cave with what seems to be only 1 way to go. Jumping and ducking your way through enemies and exploring different environments, you can collect coins to upgrade your player and unlock new abilities & cosmetics.

TRAVEL TO THE TOP OF THE LEADER-BOARDS

Take a trip and try your best to travel to the top of several leader-boards like, distance, net-worth & more coming soon!

GRIND FOR SOME COSMETICS!

Save your coins and get your favorite cosmetics! You can stack as many on top of each other as you like so have fun!

IMPROVE YOUR STATS!

With an easy to access stat window you can always check how much better you are doing than everyone else in every single way possible! Tracking everything from time in game to how many jumps you have!

UPGRADE YOUR PLAYER!

Visit the shop and choose the way you want to play by upgrading your player stats in a variety of ways as well as getting some abilities to make your travels a little easier.

MUCH MORE TO COME!

Although I am the only person developing this game. I have lots of plans for updates and future content as well as new leader-boards and more to keep the game interesting. Support me and our journey making a cool game together!

General Roadmap

  • New Level Types

  • More Dynamic Cosmetics

  • Better rewards

  • Recurring Challenge system

  • More leader-boards for stats & new levels

  • More player upgrades and abilities

  • Power ups

  • Background / Scene changes

  • UI overhaul

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (2.7 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or AMD
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS Catalina
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (3.1 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

name: The Traveler

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Windows 7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core I5-4440 3,10 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core I5-4440 3,10 GHz
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Lost and alone in a cave, you start your adventure jumping and ducking your way through enemies and different environments. Collect coins to upgrade your player & unlock new abilities and cosmetics. Maybe then you will become the top traveler...
